column1: daSa akuSala karma paTa deSanA namaH ratnatrayAya
column2: @306b # // rgya gar skad du /da sh'a ku sha la karma pa th'a / bod skad du / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: kenacid sugati prAptu kAmena heyAH daSa akuSala karma paTAH prakRti sAvadyAH tat yaTA
column2: gang zhig bde 'gro thob par 'dod pas spang bar bya ba'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'di lta ste /

column1: triviDam kAyikam karma vAcikam tu caturviDam
column2: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum @307a * //

column1: mAnasam tri prakAram ca daSA ete kuSalAH matAH
column2: dang ; / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po dang // 'di bcu mi dge ba ru gsungs // 'di rnams rab tu phye nas bshad par bya ste /

column1: ete praviBAgaSaH vyAKyAyante tatra tAvat kAyi kamprANa atipAtaH adatta AdAnam kAma miTyA AcAraH ca iti
column2: de la re zhig lus kyi ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa'o //

column1: vAcikam mRzAvAdaH pESunyam pAruzyam saMBinna pralApaH ca
column2: ngag gi ni brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa'o //

column1: mAnasaQca aBiDyA vyApAdaH miTyAdRzwiH ca
column2: yid kyi ni brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o //

column1: tatra prANa atipAtaH tu prANi BAvaH prANi saMjQA BAvaH vaDaka citta upasTitiH etad upAya karaNam
column2: de la srog gcod pa ni srog chags su gyur pa dang / srog chags su 'du shes par gyur pa dang / gsod pa'i sems nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang / de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang / srog 'gags par gyur pa ste /

column1: prANa avaroDa BAvaH ca iti etad paQcAFgEH saMyuktaH Bavati prANa atipAtaH
column2: yan lag lnga po de dag dang ldan na srog gcod pa yin no //

column1: tatra katamat adatta AdAnam para BAvaH para parigraha saMjQa tvam ca steya citta upasTitiH tad upAya karaNam sTAna cyutiH ca etat paQcAFga saMyuktam Bavati adatta AdAnam
column2: de la ma byin par len pa gang zhe na / gzhan gyir gyur pa dang / pha rol gyis yongs su bzung bar yang 'du shes pa dang / rku ba'i sems kyang nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang / de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang / gnas nas bskyod pa ste yan lag lnga po de dag dang ldan na ma byin par len par 'gyur ro //

column1: kAma miTyA AcAraH tu caturviDaH
column2: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /

column1: asTAnam akAlaH
column2: yul ma yin pa dang / dus ma yin pa dang / yan lag ma yin pa dang / 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //

column1: adeSaH agamyaH ca iti tatra asTAnam tu sat Darma pratima Adi boDisattva sTAna AcArya upADyAya dakziNIya mAtA pitR guru Adi saMniDiH
column2: de la yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos dang / sku gzugs la sogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / sbyin gnas dang / pha ma la sogs pa dang / bla ma dang nye bar gyur pa'o //

column1: akAlaH iti divase RtumatI garBiNI SiSu poziNIBiH anicCA duHKa dOrmanasya pIxitABiH azwAFga uposaTA avasTitO ca adeSaH iti muKa varcaH mArga tvam
column2: dus ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni nyin par dang / zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / sbrum ma dang / bu chung 'tsho ba dang / mi 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas nye bar gdungs pa dang / bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'o //

column1: kumAra kanyayoH puras pRzWa ranDra tvam sva gasta tvam ca agamyAH tu sarvAH para striyaH Darma Dvaja kula rakzitAH rAja rakzitAH para parigRhItAH veSyAH sambanDinyaH tiraScyaH ca
column2: yan lag ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni kha dang bshad pa'i lam dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i mdun dang rgyab kyi bug pa dang rang gi lag pa'o // 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa ni / gzhan gyi bud med thams cad dang / chos dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rigs kyis bsrungs pa dang / rgyal pos bsrungs pa dang / gzhan gyis blangs pa'i smad 'tshong ma dang / gnyen 'brel can dang / byol song ngo //

column1: evam sva BAryA sevane pi Bavati kAma miTyA AcAraH tatra mRzAvAdaH tu avAstavika tvam vastu sTiti cyutiH miTyA saMjQA BAvaH miTyA upAya upasTitiH ca
column2: de ltar rang @307b gi chung ma la brten nas 'dod pas log par g-yem par 'gyur ro //

column1: tad upAya karaNan ca iti miTyA vacana uktiH ca iti etat paQcAFga saMyoge mRzAvAdaH
column2: de la brdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba ni dngos por yang ma gyur pa dang / dngos po'i gnas skabs las nyams par gyur pa dang / log par 'du shes par gyur pa dang / log pa'i thabs kyang nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang ; de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang / brdzun gyi tshig kyang smras pa ste / yan lag lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na brdzun du smra bar 'gyur ro //

column1: pESunyam tu klizwa cittena para Beda kaTanam
column2: phra ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis gzhan 'byed pa'i tshig go //

column1: pAruzyam iti para marma veDi dveza vacanam
column2: tshig rtsub po zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi gnad la phog pa'i sdang tshig go //

column1: samBinna pralApaH iti rAga upayukta tvAt Asakti yogAt vA avAcya vacanam
column2: tshig 'khyal pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang nye bar ldan pas sam / chags pa dang nye bar ldan pas smra bar bya ba ma yin pa smra ba'o //

column1: aBiDyA iti para Dana dravya ESvaryezu tIvra Asakta citta tA
column2: brnab sems zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi rdzas dang / dbang phyug dang longs spyod rnams la chags pa'i sems mi bzad pa'o //

column1: vyApAdaH tu sattvezu vidveza BAvaH etAn sattvAn hanizyAmi rotsyAmi
column2: gnod sems zhes bya ba ni sems can la rnam par sdang ba dang / sems can 'di dag gsad do // bcing ngo //

column1: tAxayizyAmi
column2: brdeg go //

column1: banDayizyAmi iti cintanam
column2: btag go zhes sems pa'o //

column1: miTyAdRzwiH iti na asti dAnam
column2: log par lta ba zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa med /

column1: na yajQam
column2: sbyin sreg med /

column1: na iha lokaH
column2: 'jig rten 'di med /

column1: na para lokaH
column2: 'jig rten pha rol med /

column1: na SramaNaH
column2: dge sbyong med /

column1: na brAhmaNaH
column2: bram ze med /

column1: na devaH
column2: lha med /

column1: na budDaH BagavAn
column2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das med /

column1: na arhan
column2: dgra bcom pa med /

column1: na pratyekabudDaH
column2: rang sangs rgyas med /

column1: na su caritam na ca duScaritam
column2: legs par spyad pa med / nyes par spyad pa med /

column1: na sukRta duzkRta karmANAm Pala vipAkaH ca iti
column2: legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med ces pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

column1: BagavatA ukte Arya sat Darma smRti upasTAne mahAyAna sUtre ca nirdizwaH daSa akuSala karma paTaH yam tu mahAnaraka hetuH
column2: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo las 'byung ba / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ni dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu yin te /

column1: daSa akuSala karma paTa sevanena patanti sattvAH narakezu
column2: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten pas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //

column1: mahAcArya dIpaFkara SrI jQAna pAdena praNItA daSa akuSala karma paTa deSanA samAptA
column2: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa /
